Data gallery

All code for the below visualizations is on github.

Incidence density of malaria

Malaria is endemic throughout Mozambique, and 100% of the population is at risk. The below data come from the 2011 DHS. It shows the prevalence of malaria by district using rapid diagnostic tests.
